MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
DIVISION OF CHILD WELFARE LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB410381414
Licensee Name: West Michigan Partnership for Children
Licensee Address: 213 Sheldon St, SE, 2-A
Grand Rapids, MI 49503
Licensee Telephone #: (616) 281-4601
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Kristyn Peck, Designee
Name of Facility: West MI Partnership for Children
Facility Address: 213 Sheldon St, SE, 2-A
Grand Rapids, MI 49503
Facility Telephone #: (616) 259-8606
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
The agency has relocated the office since the original license was issued.
III. Methodology
On-site inspection of the new location occurred on 05/16/2017 with the new Chief
Administrator/Licensee Designee, Kristyn Peck, and Board Member/former Chief
Administrator, Sonia Noorman.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The new office location is an upper level office space with both stair and elevator
access. There is a large reception area which leads back to the main office space.
There are 10 offices, a kitchen area, and various rooms that can be utilized for
conferences, meetings, or visitation. There is storage space and a locking file
cabinet for confidential information. The equipment, furnishings and supplies will
be moved in prior to the agency operations beginning. The space is suitable for
the purposes of the agency.
V. Recommendation
I recommend no change to the current license status.
May 22, 2017
________________________________________
Kari Muntean Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved by:
May 24, 2017

Claudia Triestram Date
